articles.title: Economic Survey 2024: Who presents it and when? Why is it significant for the economy? - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The Economic Survey is traditionally presented to Parliament before the Union Budget. The inaugural Economic Survey of India was first presented for the fiscal year 1950-51.
